channel.title: Project totallyawesomeandcoolserverthatwilltakeovertheworld
channel.description:
[b]I really need to think of a shorter name. ANYWAYS![/b] The goal is to make a really awesome server with loads of content and things to do. So far I have made ideas for about 18 quests, 82 custom items, 2 random events, and 2 possible spawn setups. When I found out that I was NOT going to be able to code and design these things by myself. After alot of crying and ragequit I post this.
I need people to fill in the following spots: 2x coders 1x modelers 3x admins 5x beta testers/debuggers 1x content designers
Here is what I am doing: 2d art Hosting Server protecting Main content development Moderating Customer support Marketing Management Content managing
Payment: Payment will only be received if some one is kind enough to donate and if there is money left after marketing and server repairs. If that happens payment will be as follows. . . 9% me 16% coders 7% admins 12% modelers 11% content designers 3% beta testers/debuggers Starting off we will have NO money. So while we aren't making money in the beginning, we have to make the server profitable.
This will be my 1st major attempt at an rsps DO NOT FLAME! (please :))
If you want to help please post the following
Xfire username* What you would like to be called Email Job you want And finally,proof that you can do the job [b]*You can register for xfire at xfire.com and download. Xfire is what we will be using to communicate. (my username is snowbodys)[/b]
Thanks!

I really need to think of a shorter name.
ANYWAYS!
The goal is to make a really awesome server with loads of content and things to do.
So far I have made ideas for about 18 quests, 82 custom items, 2 random events, and 2 possible spawn setups.
